attributes.action: Extend the current stamp duty structure for first time buyer till April 2026.
attributes.additional_details: Request to the Government to extend the current stamp duty structure for first time buyer till April 2026. Keep the current stamp duty structure for one more year as many of first time buyers home buying process is in place and need time to complete.
attributes.background: Request to the Government to extend the current stamp duty structure for first time buyer till April 2026. Keep the current stamp duty structure for one more year as many of first time buyers home buying process is in place and need time to complete.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/712322
